name: Oxidus
description:
Oxidus is a FPS PVE game that is still being made by Am_Dax#0001 DM me to report any issues

Get game updates here: https://discord.gg/ytfs5vN <-----my discord server

Note: The game is in ALPHA still so you may experience bugs/glitches/lags

When a new update comes out make sure to delete the OLD version of the game so it does not lag so much.
